lyrics.title: Scream
lyrics.content: No I can't stay here longer You cannot make me cry So, I will leave you to wonder What will become of our lives I'll swallow hard Fall apart Break and bleed but You won't see Tears won't fall While pride stands tall Maybe they can't be heard or seen But tears aren't quiet things They scream They scream They scream Though my throat is on fire My eyes will be liars And they'll try to stay drier Until you turn away I'll swallow hard Fall apart Break and bleed but You won't see Tears will fall I hear them all They scream They scream Not so silent and innocent Acid rain from your finger prints Echoes rivers of loneliness Hitting the walls of my heart They scream Not so silent and innocent Acid rain from your finger prints They scream Echoes rivers of loneliness Hitting the wallѕ of my heаrt
